welcomeMessage: Hi there! 👋 I'm your TravelBuddy Assistant. What would you like help with?

getting_started.message: Let's get you started with TravelBuddy! 🚀

gs_about.message:
**What is TravelBuddy?** 🌍

Your all-in-one travel companion!

**Features:**
• Find nearby travelers on map
• Create/join group activities
• Hire verified local guides
• AI-powered trip planning
• Share travel stories & posts
• Chat with video/voice calls
• Split expenses with groups
• Find hotels, food & places

gs_signup.message:
**How to Sign Up** 📝

1. Click 'Sign Up' (top right)
2. Enter your email & password
3. Or use 'Sign up with Google'
4. Verify your email
5. Complete your profile!

That's it - you're ready!

gs_login.message:
**How to Log In** 🔐

1. Click 'Sign In' (top right)
2. Enter email & password
3. Or use 'Sign in with Google'

**Forgot password?**
→ Click 'Forgot Password'
→ Check email for reset link
→ Create new password

gs_profile.message:
**Setting Up Your Profile** 👤

1. Click avatar → 'Profile'
2. Add profile photo
3. Write your bio
4. Add travel interests
5. Set home location
6. Link social accounts

💡 Complete profiles get more connections!

gs_navigate.message:
**Navigating TravelBuddy** 🧭

**Top Navigation:**
• Home, Map, Activities, Guides

**Profile Menu:**
• My Profile, Posts, Connections
• Split Expenses, Subscriptions

**Quick Access:**
• AI Buddy - All AI features
• Notifications - Updates
• Messages - Chat list

ai_hub.message:
**AI Buddy Hub** 🏠

Your central hub for all AI features!

**How to access:**
Menu → AI Buddy

**Available tools:**
• Trip Planner
• Packing Planner
• Weather Planner
• Local Guide

All powered by advanced AI!

ai_trip.message:
**AI Trip Planner** ✈️

Generate complete itineraries!

**How to use:**
1. Go to AI Buddy → Trip Planner
2. Enter destination
3. Set travel dates
4. Choose budget & interests
5. Get day-by-day plan!

**Includes:**
• Daily activities
• Restaurant suggestions
• Transport options
• Hidden gems

ai_packing.message:
**AI Packing Planner** 🎒

Never forget essentials!

**How to use:**
1. Go to AI Buddy → Packing
2. Enter destination & dates
3. Select planned activities
4. Get custom packing list!

**Includes:**
• Weather-based clothing
• Activity gear
• Travel essentials
• Pro tips

ai_weather.message:
**AI Weather Planner** 🌤️

Plan around weather!

**How to use:**
1. Go to AI Buddy → Weather
2. Enter destination & dates
3. Get detailed forecast!

**Includes:**
• Day-by-day weather
• Best activity days
• What to pack
• Indoor alternatives

ai_local.message:
**AI Local Guide** 🧭

Discover like a local!

**How to use:**
1. Go to AI Buddy → Local Guide
2. Enter location
3. Select interests
4. Get curated spots!

**Includes:**
• Hidden gems
• Best local food
• Cultural tips
• Off-beaten paths

map_travelers.message:
**Nearby Travelers** 👥

Find travelers around you!

**How to use:**
1. Go to Map section
2. Allow location access
3. See travelers on map
4. Click to view profile
5. Connect or message!

💡 Great for meetups!

map_hotels.message:
**Find Hotels** 🏨

1. Go to Map → Hotels
2. See nearby hotels on map
3. View ratings & prices
4. Get directions
5. Contact or book!

⭐ Shows real-time availability

map_food.message:
**Food & Nightlife** 🍽️

1. Go to Map → Food & Nightlife
2. Find restaurants, cafes, bars
3. View ratings & reviews
4. See menus & prices
5. Get directions!

🍕 Discover local cuisine!

map_tourist.message:
**Tourist Places** 📍

1. Go to Map → Tourist Places
2. Find attractions nearby
3. View photos & info
4. Check timings & fees
5. Get directions!

🏛️ Museums, monuments & more!

map_shopping.message:
**Shopping & Entertainment** 🛍️

1. Go to Map → Shopping
2. Find malls, markets, stores
3. View entertainment venues
4. Check timings
5. Get directions!

🛒 Local markets to malls!

map_transport.message:
**Transport & Travel** 🚗

1. Go to Map → Transport
2. Find bus/train stations
3. Locate airports
4. Find taxi stands
5. Get directions!

🚌 All transport options!

map_emergency.message:
**Emergency Services** 🚨

1. Go to Map → Emergency
2. Find hospitals nearby
3. Locate police stations
4. Find pharmacies
5. Embassy contacts

⚠️ Stay safe while traveling!

act_browse.message:
**Browse Activities** 🔍

1. Go to Activities page
2. See activities on map
3. Filter by type/date
4. View details & members
5. Join interesting ones!

🏔️ Hiking, tours, meetups!

act_create.message:
**Create Activity** ➕

1. Go to Create Activity
2. Add title & description
3. Set date, time, location
4. Add cover image
5. Set max participants
6. Add joining fee (optional)
7. Publish!

🎉 Others can now join!

act_join.message:
**Join Activity** ✋

1. Find activity you like
2. Click 'View Details'
3. Check requirements
4. Click 'Join'
5. Pay fee (if any)
6. Added to group chat!

📱 Get reminders before event!

act_manage.message:
**Manage My Activities** ⚙️

1. Go to My Activities
2. See activities you created
3. Edit details
4. Manage participants
5. Send announcements
6. Cancel if needed

👑 Full control as organizer!

act_joined.message:
**My Joined Activities** 📋

1. Go to Joined Activities
2. See all activities joined
3. View upcoming events
4. Access group chats
5. Leave if needed

📅 Never miss an event!

act_chat.message:
**Activity Group Chat** 💬

Auto-added when you join!

**Features:**
• Text messages
• Voice messages
• Share location
• Send images
• Organizer announcements

🔔 Stay connected!

guide_find.message:
**Find a Guide** 🔍

1. Go to Guides section
2. Search by location
3. Filter: language, price, rating
4. View guide profiles
5. Read reviews
6. Select your guide!

All guides are verified!

guide_book.message:
**Book a Guide** 📅

1. Select guide profile
2. Choose date & time
3. Select service type
4. Add special requests
5. Pay securely
6. Get confirmation!

💬 Chat with guide anytime!

guide_become.message:
**Become a Guide** ⭐

1. Go to Guide Setup
2. Complete verification
3. Add expertise & languages
4. Set availability
5. Set your rates
6. Upload portfolio
7. Start receiving bookings!

💰 Earn sharing your knowledge!

guide_dashboard.message:
**Guide Dashboard** 📊

Manage your guide business!

**Features:**
• View bookings
• Accept/decline requests
• See earnings
• Manage availability
• View reviews
• Update profile

📈 Track your success!

guide_bookings.message:
**My Guide Bookings** 📋

**As Traveler:**
• View booked guides
• Upcoming tours
• Past tours
• Leave reviews

**As Guide:**
• Pending requests
• Confirmed bookings
• Completed tours
• Earnings history

post_upload.message:
**Upload Post** 📷

1. Go to Upload Post
2. Add photos/videos
3. Write caption
4. Add location tag
5. Add hashtags
6. Set visibility
7. Post!

✨ AI Enhance available!

post_article.message:
**Write Article** 📝

1. Go to Upload Article
2. Add cover image
3. Write title
4. Write content
5. Add tags
6. Publish!

✍️ Share travel stories!

post_manage.message:
**Manage Content** ⚙️

1. Go to Manage Posts/Articles
2. View all your content
3. Edit or delete
4. See analytics
5. Manage comments

📊 Track engagement!

post_discover.message:
**Discover Content** 🔍

1. Go to User Posts
2. Browse travel content
3. Like & comment
4. Follow creators
5. Read articles

🌍 Get inspired!

chat_dm.message:
**Direct Messages** 💬

**Start a chat:**
1. Go to user's profile
2. Click message icon
3. Start chatting!

**Features:**
• Text messages
• Send images
• Voice messages
• Share location
• Real-time typing indicator

chat_voice.message:
**Voice Calls** 📞

1. Open chat with user
2. Click phone icon
3. Wait for answer
4. Talk!

**Features:**
• HD audio
• Mute option
• Speaker mode
• Call history

chat_video.message:
**Video Calls** 📹

1. Open chat with user
2. Click video icon
3. Allow camera access
4. Wait for answer
5. Video chat!

**Features:**
• HD video
• Camera on/off
• Mute audio
• Full screen

chat_audio.message:
**Audio Messages** 🎤

1. Open any chat
2. Hold microphone button
3. Record message
4. Release to send

**Features:**
• Playback controls
• Waveform preview
• Listen anytime

exp_about.message:
**Split Expenses** 💰

Travel with friends? We help!

**Features:**
• Create expense groups
• Log shared expenses
• Auto-calculate splits
• Settlement suggestions
• Track who owes whom

💡 No more awkward money talks!

exp_group.message:
**Create Group** 👥

1. Go to Split Expenses
2. Click 'Create Group'
3. Name your group
4. Add members
5. Start tracking!

👥 Add anyone from contacts!

exp_add.message:
**Add Expense** ➕

1. Open expense group
2. Click 'Add Expense'
3. Enter description
4. Enter amount
5. Select who paid
6. Select who shares
7. Save!

📊 Auto-calculates splits!

exp_settle.message:
**Settle Up** 💵

1. View group balances
2. See who owes whom
3. Get settlement suggestions
4. Mark as settled
5. Track history!

🤝 Simplified settlements!

exp_calc.message:
**Expense Calculator** 🧮

Quick split calculations!

**Features:**
• Equal split
• Percentage split
• Custom amounts
• Tip calculator

📱 Quick access in app!

conn_about.message:
**Connections** 👥

Your travel network!

**Benefits:**
• Stay connected with travelers
• See their posts & activities
• Quick chat access
• Plan trips together

🌐 Build your travel community!

conn_add.message:
**Add Connections** ➕

**Ways to connect:**
• From Map - click traveler
• From Activities - members
• From Posts - content creators
• Search by name

1. Visit profile
2. Click 'Connect'
3. Wait for accept!

conn_manage.message:
**Manage Connections** ⚙️

1. Go to Connections page
2. View all connections
3. See pending requests
4. Accept/decline
5. Remove if needed

📊 Track your network!

conn_profile.message:
**View Traveler Profile** 👤

See complete profile:

• Profile photo & bio
• Travel interests
• Posts & articles
• Activities joined
• Reviews given
• Message button

🔍 Learn before connecting!

pay_methods.message:
**Payment Methods** 💳

**We accept:**
• Credit/Debit Cards
• UPI (GPay, PhonePe, etc.)
• Net Banking
• Wallets

🔐 Secured by Razorpay

pay_sub.message:
**Subscription Plans** ⭐

**Free:**
• Basic features
• Limited AI requests

**Premium:**
• Unlimited AI
• Priority matching
• Ad-free
• Exclusive features

🚀 Upgrade from Subscription page!

pay_refund.message:
**Refunds** ↩️

**Guide Bookings:**
• 48+ hrs: Full refund
• 24-48 hrs: 50%
• <24 hrs: No refund

**Subscription:**
• Cancel anytime
• Access till period ends

📧 Contact support for issues

pay_secure.message:
**Payment Security** 🔒

• Razorpay certified
• PCI DSS compliant
• 256-bit SSL
• No card storage
• OTP verification

💯 100% safe transactions!

help_bug.message:
**Report Bug** 🐛

**Try first:**
• Refresh page
• Clear cache
• Different browser

**Still issues?**
📧 support@travelbuddy.com

Include:
• Screenshot
• Steps to reproduce
• Browser info

help_account.message:
**Account Issues** 👤

**Can't login?**
→ Reset password

**Account hacked?**
→ Contact support ASAP

**Delete account?**
→ Profile → Settings → Delete

**Change email?**
→ Profile → Settings

help_safety.message:
**Safety** 🛡️

**Feeling unsafe?**
→ Map → Emergency Services

**Report user:**
→ Profile → Report

**Harassment:**
→ Block + Report

**Scam:**
→ Never pay outside app
→ Report immediately

help_contact.message:
**Contact Support** 📧

📧 support@travelbuddy.com
⏰ Response: 24 hours

🕐 Working hours:
Mon-Sat: 9 AM - 6 PM IST

🚨 Urgent safety issues:
Use in-app emergency feature
